title: Clean Development Task Interface
description: Remove Branch field, PR status indicator, and Rebase link from Development Task display to create a streamlined, focused interface that reduces visual clutter.
iWant: a clean Development Task interface without Branch, PR status, and Rebase elements
soThat: I can focus on essential task information without unnecessary distractions
acceptanceCriteria: Branch field is removed from Development Task display
PR created and ready for development message is hidden
Rebase link is eliminated from task interface
Task display maintains proper layout after element removal
